entry.def: Patriotism is love for your country and loyalty towards it.

example.ex: He was a country boy who had joined the army out of a sense of patriotism and adventure...
example.tran: 他是个乡下小伙儿，参军是出于爱国之心和冒险精神。

example.ex: We live in an age when patriotism is often sneered at.
example.tran: 我们生活在一个爱国主义常常被嗤之以鼻的时代。

means.word_mean: 1. love of country and willingness to sacrifice for it

stems_affixes.value_cn: 家长的;族长的;家长似的
stems_affixes.word_buile: patriarch家长+al……的→adj.家长的;族长的;家长似的
patri父,祖+arch统治者,首脑,长→n.家长;族长
patri父亲+archy统治者→n.家长,父系社会
patri父亲+mony状态或物→父亲留下的物品→遗产
patri祖国[比喻成父亲]+ot人→n.爱国者,爱国主义者
patriot爱国+ism主义→n.爱国主义;爱国心
ex出+patri祖国+ate表动词→出祖国→驱逐出国
re重新+patri祖国+ate表动词→重新回到祖国

means.word_mean: 爱国主义;爱国心, 爱国精神

sentences.en: They showed patriotism to their country.
sentences.cn: 他们表达了他们的爱国之心。
